decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (LP(0)01, 150909-101 Rev A, 150909-201 Rev A, 150909-301 Rev A, SW2229 and design and access statement received on 02/12/2015 and email confirming that the gate would be a telescopic gate received on 22/01/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the rear yard plan (150909-301 Rev A received on 02/12/2015), prior to the commencement of development on the site, a plan of the service yard, including swept path analysis, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority to ensure that vehicles would be able to safely enter and exit the service yard despite the layout of the proposed storage racks within the yard.  The layout, as approved, shall not thereafter be laid out other than in accordance with the approved details.
Condition : 4 - Material shall not be stacked or deposited to a height exceeding 3 metres.
description: Erection and installation of a new canopy, fence, roller shutters, vents and stands for storage of structural steel to the existing industrial building
